enhanced_by.reason: The ongoingOrders method provides the current state of orders, which is necessary to determine the orderId for repayment.
The collateralAccount method provides information about the collateral account, which might be necessary to validate the repayment process.
The repaymentHistory method provides historical repayment data, which can be used to verify the correctness of the repayment operation.
After repayment, the ongoingOrders method can be used to verify that the order status has been updated correctly.
